title: Sportscast - October 5, 2015
text:
Sports » CBS 2 Local Sports » Sportscast - October 5, 2015 CBS 2 Local Sports 
Updated: Mon, Oct 05 2015, 11:06 PM 
The full sportscast from the Fox 28 News at 9 on Monday, October 5th. Related Stories Ed Thomas Coach of the Week Faith, Family, Football. Words of Inspiration from the Coach Ed Thomas Foundation. CBS 2 and FOX 28 in partnership with the Eastern Iowa Airport are looking for coaches who embody the spirit of Coach Thomas by having a strong impact on the community and on the sidelines. Nominate your favorite coach from any sport in the form below. Your Name:
